Xiaohongshu has open-sourced its latest speech recognition model: FireRedASR, which is good at recognizing Chinese and English, dialects/lyrics, achieving a new best level in the public Mandarin ASR benchmark test.

There are two architecture designs, LLM version with 8.3B parameters, high recognition accuracy, supporting seamless end-to-end voice interaction, suitable for high-quality voice transcription.

AED version with 1.1B parameters, can balance performance and efficiency, suitable for general application scenarios.

以前爬100个网页，现在爬21个就能达到同样效果，效率提高了近5倍

Crawl4LLM根据网页对LLM预训练的影响力来选择要爬取的网页，先评估哪些网页更有价值，对训练模型更有帮助，优先抓取高价值网页

Crawl4LLM selects the pages to crawl based on their influence on pre-training LLMs, evaluating which pages are more valuable and more helpful for training models, prioritizing high-value pages. 5138250295936324.original:
In recent years, there has been talk about large models replacing jobs. It is true, large models are currently like temporary outsourcing; they can likely perform at mid-to-high levels in many areas, but they also have the characteristic of "being strong when facing strong tasks and weak when facing weak tasks" —\u00b is your job something that can be handled just by temporary outsourcing? 

Moreover, and most importantly, large models can produce a vast amount of content, present across various social media and websites, but who is going to curate, verify, and consume it? 

Curating topics may be more important now than ever before.

5138624175670695.original:
大模型自动化写代码构想：写好需求后，提前写好“测试集”跟“验收集”，大模型写好代码后，自己机器跑一遍，测试集的错误案例会完整发给大模型，让它改正；验收集只会给出正确率

测试集、验收集都能设置正确率，达到就通过。模型尝试8次（或许也应当可以设置？）后扔不达标，就停止
5138624175670695.processed:
Concept of using large models to automate coding: After writing the requirements, prepare the "test set" and "acceptance set" in advance. Once the large model has finished writing the code, run it on your own machine. The error cases from the test set will be fully given to the large model for it to correct; the acceptance set will only provide accuracy rates.

Both the test set and acceptance set can have accuracy rates set, passing when the threshold is reached. If the model attempts 8 times (perhaps this can also be set?) and still doesn't meet the standard, it stops.
5138624175670695.refined_with_url: Concept of using large models to automate coding: After writing the requirements, prepare the "test set" and "acceptance set" in advance. Once the large model has finished writing the code, run it on your own machine. The error cases from the test set will be fully given to the large model for it to correct; the acceptance set will only provide accuracy rates. Both the test set and acceptance set can have accuracy rates set, passing when the threshold is reached. If the model attempts 8 times (perhaps this can also be set?) and still doesn't meet the standard, it stops.

5142196588120810.original:
一图看清 ChatGPT 不同模型和订阅之间的差别

- GPT-4o 是目前功能最全面的模型。
- GPT-4.5 紧随其后，可能是因为它与 GPT-4o 存在很多相似的机制。
- 推理（Reasoning）类的模型特别不一致，各种功能的开启情况也比较随机。
- 目前自定义 GPT（Custom GPT）功能只能使用 GPT-4o。
5142196588120810.processed:
A diagram to understand the differences between various ChatGPT models and subscriptions:

- GPT-4o is currently the most comprehensive model.
- GPT-4.5 comes next, possibly due to its similar mechanisms with GPT-4o.
- Reasoning models are particularly inconsistent, with feature activation varying randomly.
- Currently, Custom GPT features can only use GPT-4o.
5142196588120810.refined_with_url:
A diagram to understand the differences between various ChatGPT models and subscriptions:

- GPT-4o is currently the most comprehensive model.

- Currently, Custom GPT features can only use GPT-4o.

5144958971154090.original:
氛围感编程（Vibe coding）是指，全靠AI编程，甚至只要动动嘴，代码就实现完了，但由于不熟悉代码，遇到错误也只能交由AI更改，随机抽取正确答案——听起来很像组长分派任务给手下几个程序员

名称由计算机科学家 Andrej Karpathy 首次提出（图一） #AI创造营#
5144958971154090.processed:
Vibe coding refers to relying entirely on AI for programming, where you just need to say what you want, and the code is completed. However, due to a lack of familiarity with the code, when errors occur, only AI can be asked to make changes, randomly selecting the correct answer—it sounds very much like a leader assigning tasks to several programmers.

The term was first proposed by computer scientist Andrej Karpathy (Picture 1). /search?containerid=231522type%3D1%26t%3D10%26q%3D%23AI%E5%88%9B%E9%80%A0%E8%90%A5%23
5144958971154090.refined_with_url: Vibe coding refers to relying entirely on AI for programming, where you just need to say what you want, and the code is completed. However, due to a lack of familiarity with the code, when errors occur, only AI can be asked to make changes, randomly selecting the correct answer—it sounds very much like a leader assigning tasks to several programmers. The term was first proposed by computer scientist Andrej Karpathy (Picture 1). https://m.weibo.cn/search?containerid=231522type%3D1%26t%3D10%26q%3D%23AI%E5%88%9B%E9%80%A0%E8%90%A5%23
